name: Puyo Puyo~n
description: Puyo Puyo~n (ぷよぷよ〜ん, Puyopuyōn), also known as Puyo Puyo 4, and Puyo Puyo~n Party (for the N64 version) is the fourth installment of the Puyo Puyo puzzle game series, created by Sega and Compile for the Sega Dreamcast, Sony PlayStation, Nintendo 64 and Game Boy Color. Like many of the Puyo Puyo games, it was never officially released outside Japan. The title of Puyo Puyo~n comes from the Japanese word yon (四, meaning four), signifying the fourth game in the series. Plans were made for a 64DD version entitled Puyo Puyo~n 64 (ぷよぷよ〜ん, Puyopuyōn rokujuon), but it was later cancelled.
